document_data.name: Medallion of Time
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Medallion of Time''''' was a piece of jewelry with the power to change the time frame of elements within the [[Mobius Tower]].{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|123}}{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|113}}
document_data.Description: The ''Medallion of Time'' was large, with an intrincate design.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|122}}
document_data.Powers: The ''Medallion of Time'' had the power to change the time frame of any object to the wearer's time frame up to three times a week. It was one of the only two ways that such a thing could be achieved in Mobius' Tower.
document_data.History: The ''Medallion of Time'' was worn by the [[Guardian of Time]] inside Mobius' Tower. Adventurers may have used it to remove the crystal minaret required by [[Martek]]'s trials,{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|120}} but the Guardian would not have given it up without a fight.
